entities.name: weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley woke them after only a few hours sleep. He used magic to pack up the tents, and they left the campsite as quickly as possible...

entities.name: roberts
entities.description: Mr. Roberts had a strange, dazed look about him, and he waved them off with a vague “Merry Christmas.”

entities.name: basil
entities.description: They found a great number of witches and wizards gathered around Basil, the keeper of the Portkeys...

entities.name: portkeys
entities.description: all clamoring to get away from the campsite as quickly as possible. Mr. Weasley had a hurried discussion with Basil; they joined the queue, and were able to take an old rubber tire back

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley waved goodbye to Mr. Roberts as they left the campsite.
